span.$t: Arrived 2 days before schedule. Fit and plug were perfect.  Only installed them a month.  Came charged, but charged as instructed before using.  So far, working fine.
Was this review helpful to you?

p.$t: You are limited to 10 product links in your review, and your link text may not be longer than 256 characters.

div.$t: In the text of your review, you can link directly to any product offered on Amazon.com. To insert a product link, follow these steps:
1. Find the product you want to reference on Amazon.com
2. Copy the web address of the product
3. Click
4. Paste the web address in the box
5. Click
6. Selecting the item displayed will insert text that looks like this:

span.$t: 7. When your review is displayed on Amazon.com, this text will be transformed into a hyperlink, like so:
